column2: "Weapon proficiency takes daily practice. The more training you do, the more you'll improve."
"You may find it hard and exhausting at first, but the more boot camps you complete, the more you'll start to enjoy the process."
"I've sent out countless students like that. So just put your mind at ease and follow me."
"This is an explanation of the knuckles gear system.  By learning the \"knuckles\" skill, a gear gauge will be added to the top of the Weapon Palette.  Attack with knuckles to charge the gear gauge."
"As the gear gauge rises, your attack speed increases, giving you an advantage in combat.  The gear gauge starts dropping whenever you stop attacking."
